languages.text: {n}Маражай отвечает недоброму гулу презрительным смехом.{/n} "Прекрасно! Лучшего я и не ждал! Слышишь, сколько гнева вызывает одно мое появление? О, эту бойню я запомню надол..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай отвечает недоброму гулу презрительным смехом.{/n} "Прекрасно! Лучшего я и не ждал! Эту бойню я запомню надол..."

languages.text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай отвечает недоброму гулу презрительным смехом.{/n} "Прекрасно! Лучшего я и не ждал! Слышишь, сколько гнева вызывает одно мое появление? О, эту бойню я запомню надол..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with a contemptuous laughter.{/n} "It is beautiful! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance has caused? Oh, how I will cherish this sla..."

{n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with a contemptuous laughter.{/n} "It is beautiful! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance has caused? Oh, how I will cherish this sla..."

{n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

{n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

{n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai antwortet auf das feindselige Grollen mit verächtlichem Gelächter.{/n} "Ausgezeichnet! Ich hatte nichts anderes erwartet! Hört Ihr, wie viel Zorn mein bloßes Erscheinen provoziert? Oh, wie ich dieses Gemetzel genieß-"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai antwortet auf das feindselige Grollen mit verächtlichem Gelächter.{/n} "Ausgezeichnet! Ich hatte nichts anderes erwartet! Hört Ihr, wie viel Zorn mein bloßes Erscheinen provoziert? Oh, wie ich dieses Gemetzel genieß-"

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋轻蔑地大笑起来，回应着这些人充满怒意的嘀咕。{/n}“太棒了！这正是我期望的场面！你看没看到，我仅仅是露了个面，就惹得这么多人气急败坏！噢，我会非常珍视这场屠——”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋轻蔑地大笑起来，回应着这些人充满怒意的嘀咕。{/n}“太棒了！这正是我期望的场面！你看没看到，我仅仅是露了个面，就惹得这么多人气急败坏！噢，我会非常珍视这场屠——”

languages.text: {n}Le grondement malveillant est accueilli par le rire méprisant de Marazhai.{/n} « Parfait ! Je n'en attendais pas moins ! Entendez-vous la colère que suscite ma seule présence ? Oh, je vais adorer ce massa... »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le grondement malveillant est accueilli par le rire méprisant de Marazhai.{/n} « Parfait ! Je n'en attendais pas moins ! Entendez-vous la colère que suscite ma seule présence ? Oh, je vais adorer ce massa... »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai responde a los desagradables murmullos con una risa despectiva.{/n} «¡Excelente! ¡No esperaba menos! ¿Oyes la cólera que provoca mi mera presencia? Voy a disfrutar mucho con esta masa...».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai responde a los desagradables murmullos con una risa despectiva.{/n} «¡Excelente! ¡No esperaba menos! ¿Oyes la cólera que provoca mi mera presencia? Voy a disfrutar mucho con esta masa...».

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは冷酷な言葉に侮蔑を込めた笑いで返す。{/n}「素晴らしい！何も期待はしていなかった！俺のただの見た目がどれだけ怒りを招くか聞いたか？大切にしようではないか、この…」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは冷酷な言葉に侮蔑を込めた笑いで返す。{/n}「素晴らしい！何も期待はしていなかった！俺のただの見た目がどれだけ怒りを招くか聞いたか？大切にしようではないか、この…」

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, bu nahoş gürültüye, kibirli bir kahkahayla yanıt veriyor.{/n} "Harikulade! Tam beklediğim gibi! Sırf görüntümün bile ne kadar büyük bir öfkeye sebep olduğunu duyabiliyor musun? Ah, bu katliamın tadını öyle gü..."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai answers the unkind rumbling with contemptuous laughter.{/n} "Excellent! I expected nothing less! Do you hear how much anger my mere appearance provokes? Oh, how I will cherish this slaug—"
